General.Name: Suzhou Industrial Park Heshun Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Industrial Park Heshun Electric Co., Ltd. engages in production and sale of power equipment. It is involved in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of power transmission and distribution equipment, including voltage power equipment, voltage power quality equipment, energy metering devices, electric vehicle charging/swapping station equipment, and power capacitors. Suzhou Industrial Park Heshun Electric Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Suzhou, China.

4.Name: Mr. Shujie  Xu
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
